item.description: It has been well over three months and KPop Demon Hunters is Netflix's #1 movie. How on earth is it staying up there?

item.title: How Clean Energy Just Overtook Coal — And Why It’s Under Threat
item.description: Clean energy has, for the first time, generated more electricity than coal — but political backlash now threatens the science that made it possible.
